data.message: Cps was investigating him I found out prior to me ever being born because he broke my sister's arms and legs when she was a toddler as you can see in the video she is a toddler still when he talks about the charge and then about passing the polygraph. Our parents always said someone broke into our house and threw her out of her crib which makes no sense what so ever... didn't take a thing.. sure he broke her arms and legs and was able to have more children even after that.
